This game sounds excite with comfortable operation. ------------------------------------------------------------- Operation ・Move(← →, AD) ・Jump(↑, W) ・Dash(B, Shift) * If you connect the joypad before starting the game, you can play with the joypad. Update 2019/11/19 Add 2 Levels. 2020/02/03 Add 4 Levels.
